In order to reach the other shore, Ryza and the others head to Kurken Port, <CLGR>on the east side of the island<CLNR>.

On the way to Kurken Port, they encounter Agatha, the island's top guardian, on guard duty. Knowing they could get caught trying to get to the port, they change plans and head to the secret dock near Ryza's house, hoping they can make their way to the mainland from there. [memo]Head to the abandoned dock on the coast near Ryza's house.

The adventurers arrive on the mainland for the first time in their lives. Unable to track down the merchant they were hoping to find, they decide to head to an area known to the villagers as Pixie Forest. Seeing it as a chance for adventure, they <CLGR>head into the forest<CLNR>.
While making good progress, Ryza suddenly hears someone calling out for help. The three friends run toward the source of the sound, heading <CLGR>deeper into the forest<CLNR>.
They arrive in the heart of the forest, where they see a girl under attack by a monster. Ryza decides to save the girl and bravely stands up to the monster!
Ryza is able to rescue the girl, Klaudia, and they decide that's a good place to end their adventure for now. They head back the way they came and leave the forest.

On the way back, the adventurers are attacked by a monster they've never seen before. They find themselves in grave danger, when suddenly a mysterious duo comes to their rescue. Afterward, they head to the <CLGR>port leading back to the island<CLNR>--and all the while Ryza's heart is racing upon learning of the existence of alchemy.

Ryza butts heads with Bos, son of a prominent villager. This happens often, and Bos always seems to have a sarcastic remark ready to toss Ryza's way. Feeling annoyed and frustrated, she <CLGR>returns home<CLNR>.

Ryza's spirits raise a bit when Lent and Tao show up and tell her they've found out that their enigmatic saviors, Empel and Lila, are staying in the village--specifically, in Old Town, which is to the south of the Boden district. Ryza decides to pay them a visit, in hopes of convincing Empel to teach her alchemy. [memo]Head to <CLGR>the east side of Old Town<CLNR> and find Empel's residence.
The adventurers arrive in Fairystone Forest, gather all the Nameless Grass they need, and hurry back to <CLGR>Empel's residence<CLNR>.

Empel watches on as Ryza makes her first synthesis attempt--and to her happy surprise, it's successful. Satisfied with the results, Empel gives Ryza an alchemy book and tells her to start studying. Ryza <CLGR>rushes home to start working on more recipes<CLNR>.

Ryza builds an atelier of her own to keep practicing her synthesis. Following Empel's instructions, she attempts to create <CLGR>every item in the book<CLNR>. [memo]Synthesize an Explosive Uni and Grass Beans.
Lent says he wants to explore the Traveler's Road--Ryza likes this idea, so they decide to <CLGR>head north from the port<CLNR>.

The adventurers encounter a number of strange new monsters on the Traveler's Road. Seeing a good chance to gain some experience, Lent decides to fight until he feels satisfied. [memo]Fight at least 3 monsters.
After getting some battle experience, the group returns to the village <CLGR>without being discovered<CLNR>.

Empel teaches Ryza about Recipe Transformation so she can create the <CLGR>Reaper's Scythe<CLNR>, which she quickly decides to try out for herself. [memo]Synthesize an Ingot to activate Recipe Morph and create the Reaper's Scythe.

With the Reaper's Scythe synthesized, Ryza heads out to harvest the Kurken Fruit, which grows on the farm on the southwestern edge of the island. Having done what her mother asks, she <CLGR>hands over the Kurken Fruit to her father<CLNR>. [memo]Use the scythe to harvest Kurken Fruit and give at least 5 to Karl.
Ryza is happy she was able to fulfill her promise, and <CLGR>returns to her room<CLNR> with pride.
Ryza had previously visited Klaudia at her home, and Klaudia wants to return the favor. Ryza awaits Klaudia's visit. [memo]Wait in Ryza's room for at least 1 day.

Klaudia soon arrives at Ryza's house. They've already become good friends, but Klaudia isn't able to come and go as she pleases. Meanwhile, Ryza decides to visit the mainland and explore Pixie Forest once again.

As she tries to leave, Ryza runs into her father, who asks her to go to Fressher's shop and buy some goat meat. With no way to say no, Ryza heads to the <CLGR>shop near the entrance to the Boden district<CLNR>. [memo]Go to Fressher's general store and purchase some goat meat.

After bringing the goat meat back to her dad, Karl says he'll give her a reward if she helps out some of the other villagers. For the time being, Ryza decides to explore <CLGR>Pixie Forest<CLNR>. [memo]Head to the clearing in Pixie Forest.

Ryza and her friends return to her room, where Lent suggests they expand their adventuring range beyond Pixie Forest. Ryza agrees and begins to make plans. [memo]Synthesize or explore, and wait in your room for 1 day.
Out of nowhere, Empel asks Ryza to come see him. The adventurers meet up and then head to <CLGR>Empel's residence<CLNR>.

When they arrive, they find out it was actually Lila who wanted to talk to them. She gives them a mission to explore a cave to the <CLGR>west of the Traveler's Road<CLNR>, where they must <CLGR>obtain some ore<CLNR>. They're unsure if they'll find it in the ground itself, or if they'll have to defeat a monster to get it. [memo]Head to the west of the Traveler's Road and search the cave for a blue ore.
After battling a number of monsters, Ryza finds what Lila asked for--Koberinite. They leave the cave to <CLGR>report back to Lila<CLNR>.

Arriving at Empel's residence, Ryza finds an injured Lent. Ryza decides to show off her newfound alchemy skills by <CLGR>making some medicine<CLNR> to treat his wounds. [memo]Use "Envision Recipe" on Grass Beans to create a Blessing Ointment with at least 30 Quality and give it to Lila.
Lent feels much better after using Ryza's Blessing Ointment, and Ryza's pride swells at Lila's praise. She decides to <CLGR>visit Klaudia<CLNR> to brag about it a bit.

Ryza visits Klaudia and tells her how great things are going. Klaudia, a bit envious, mentions that she'd like to join Ryza on her adventures. Ryza agrees enthusiastically, and eventually decides to <CLGR>return home<CLNR>.
After talking to Empel, Ryza decides to make the building materials for her secret hideout. She gathers everyone together <CLGR>at her house<CLNR> to brainstorm ideas.
Ryza figures out what materials she'll need to build the hideout, and decides to start with the easiest items first. [memo]Make one of the materials you came up with.

Ryza creates the materials she needs one by one, but there's still a long way to go before the hideout is finished. With the materials ready, they need to head to the <CLGR>clearing in Pixie Forest<CLNR>. [memo]Make 5 of each necessary material, then give them to your friends in Pixie Forest.
The secret hideout is now complete. While Ryza surveys their new base, they all talk about how they'd like to decorate it. [memo]Look around the inside and outside of the base.
The adventurers encounter a mysterious monster. It doesn't attack them, but they feel such a sense of danger that they quickly retreat and <CLGR>consult with Empel about it<CLNR>.

After hearing about the monster, Empel and Lila decide to move into the atelier to conduct a thorough investigation. Ryza <CLGR>goes to tell Klaudia, who's already returned home<CLNR>, what happened. [memo]Head to Klaudia's house.

After visiting Klaudia, Lubart confronts Ryza about her negative reputation around town and makes it clear she's not welcome. It's implied that if Ryza can help out the villagers and improve that reputation, Lubart might be more willing to hear her out. So Ryza decides to go around and <CLGR>talk to the townsfolk<CLNR>. [memo]Complete 3 requests, and then wait 1 day.
After helping out the villagers, Ryza feels certain she's done enough, so she heads back to <CLGR>Klaudia's house<CLNR> once again to talk to Lubart.

Lubart gives Ryza his own personal opinion--he's still not sure, so he tasks her with creating an item that can stop the leak in their basement. [memo]Create a Soft Rubber Stone with at least 50 Quality and give it to Lubart.

Ryza is impatient to receive her next task, but she decides it's better not to visit Klaudia at the moment. Instead, she takes some time to <CLGR>wander around the village<CLNR>. [memo]Head to the Boden district.

Lubart gives Ryza his next task--this time, she has to clear up a large pile of debris. She decides that picking up each piece one by one is too much of a pain, so she decides to <CLGR>create a powerful explosive<CLNR> and blow it all up at once. [memo]Create a Bomb with at least 50 Quality and bring it to the debris field.

Ryza's Bomb does the trick and clears the debris, but her tasks aren't finished just yet. She decides to practice her synthesis until she gets her next task. [memo]Synthesize or explore, and wait at your atelier for 1 day.
Ryza listens to Klaudia play her flute, and then decides to wander around town for a bit. On a whim, she decides to visit <CLGR>the center of town<CLNR>. [memo]Head to the Boden district.

Ryza brings her fish bait to the fishermen, but she'll have to <CLGR>wait till the next day for the results<CLNR>. She decides to <CLGR>head back to the atelier<CLNR> for the time being. [memo]Wait at the atelier for about 1 day.

The next day, Tao visits the atelier to let Ryza know that the fishermen are reporting huge hauls, which Ryza is very proud of. He also lets her know that Lubart wants to talk to her, so she <CLGR>heads to Klaudia's house<CLNR> right away.
As soon as she arrives, Ryza receives her final task from Lubart. But to get the details of the job, she first has to <CLGR>head to the mainland port<CLNR>.
The adventurers have to go rescue Bos, who's apparently been attacked by the dragon. They want to meet up with Agatha, so they rush to the <CLGR>mainland port<CLNR>.

Ryza reports what happened, and while the outcome of the competition is left somewhat vague, Lubart considers the task completed--meaning Klaudia is now allowed to accompany them on their adventures. With so much happening all at once, Ryza decides to head to <CLGR>the center of town<CLNR> to relax for a while. [memo]Head to the Boden district.

Ryza heads to Klaudia's house, where the two of them enjoy a friendly chat. But later they overhear Lubart and Agatha discussing a rather ominous topic--at which point they decide to sneak into <CLGR>Brunnen Manor<CLNR>, which rests <CLGR>on top of the hill east of the Boden district<CLNR>.
At Brunnen Manor, they're discussing hunting down the dragon that attacked Bos. Ryza tries to eavesdrop, but she accidentally reveals herself and is forced to <CLGR>retreat to the atelier<CLNR>.

The adventurers spot Agatha and her group as they head to the old castle to hunt the dragon--they also notice Bos among the party. Unwilling to let Bos hog all the glory, they decide to <CLGR>follow the others<CLNR> and head to Meteor Castle themselves.

They find the dragon waiting for them at Meteor Castle. Agatha's squad had already taken a crack at it, but they found themselves nearly destroy. So now Ryza and her friends are committed to taking on the dragon!

After safely returning Bos to his father, Ryza's left feeling unsure about the way Moritz thanks her. Regardless, it was a harrowing ordeal, but in the end they were able to slay the dragon. She decides to <CLGR>return to the atelier<CLNR> and get some rest for now.

Back at the atelier, everyone's heaping praise on Ryza, but the mood quickly sours when they're reminded of the mysterious monster they met in the forest. They learn that these creatures are known as the <CLGR>Philuscha<CLNR>, that they reside in the Underworld, and that they're responsible for the destruction of the ancient Klint Kingdom. Now that the Philuscha have reappeared, Empel says they have no time to waste. He gives Ryza another alchemy book, who prepares to create even more powerful items to fight against the Philuscha. [memo]Create a Plajig and a Luft.
The adventurers run into Bos in town--after rescuing him from the dragon, things have only gotten more awkward between them. They return <CLGR>to the atelier soon after<CLNR>.

Lost in thought at her atelier, Ryza gets the sense that something isn't right with the lake. Remembering back when all the fish disappeared, she <CLGR>decides to go and talk with the fishermen<CLNR>. [memo]Head to Kurken Port.

When Ryza meets with the fishermen, they tell her that the fish have stopped biting again, and ask for <CLGR>even stronger bait<CLNR> than before. Ryza comes up with a possible bait that has an even stronger scent, but she's not sure where to find the materials to make it--luckily Empel is able to point her in the right direction. [memo]Head north on the Traveler's Road to find the materials you need to make Powerful Fish Bait with quality of at least 70.

Ryza brings the Powerful Fish Bait to the fishermen, but just like before, she'll need to wait <CLGR>at least until the next day<CLNR> to see how it goes. [memo]Wait 1 day and then return to Kurken Port.

Ryza returns to see how her bait worked, but as it turns out the fishermen still aren't able to catch anything, leading them to complain that alchemy is useless. Disappointed, Ryza and the others <CLGR>return to the atelier<CLNR>.

At the atelier, Ryza vents her frustration to Empel. Changing the subject, Empel mentions that he'd like to meet with Moritz in order to request permission to investigate the gates leading to the Underworld. So they all decide to head to <CLGR>Treppe Hill<CLNR>.

Upon arriving at Kurken Port, Lila mentions that there's a giant monster in the lake that arrived from the open seas. Since nobody else seems to believe it exists, she's relying on Ryza to do something about it. Ryza <CLGR>hurries back to the atelier<CLNR> to get to work. [memo]Wait at the atelier for 1 day.

When they arrive back at the atelier, Empel gives Ryza another alchemy book and asks her to <CLGR>create a special fragrance<CLNR>, which Ryza is happy to do. [memo]Create Monster Attractor with a quality of at least 60 and give it to Empel.

After creating the Monster Attractor, the adventurers look for more information on the giant beast, but to no avail. With no other ideas, Ryza decides to just ask the villagers about it directly and heads to <CLGR>the center of town<CLNR>. [memo]Head to the Boden district.
Ryza's near her house when she's stopped by her mother, who's been hearing nasty rumors about Empel. She also mentions rumors about Kurken Port, which prompts Ryza to <CLGR>rush to the area<CLNR>.

At Kurken Port Ryza runs into Agatha, who's been investigating the rumors herself and tells her how the rumors got started. Armed with the knowledge that Bos is responsible, she immediately goes to confront him at Brunnen Manor on <CLGR>Treppe Hill<CLNR>.

When Ryza arrives at Brunnen Manor, Moritz takes the opportunity to give her a summons to be delivered to Empel. Shaking with anger, Ryza relents and <CLGR>returns to the atelier<CLNR> to tell Empel about it.
The town assembly gets under way, and villagers immediately start blaming Empel. But almost as if on cue, a giant monster surfaces at Kurken Port. The adventurers <CLGR>rush to confront it<CLNR>.
At the port, they come face to face with a massive new beast. They've already beaten a dragon, so they feel confident they can handle this foe just as easily!

The adventurers manage to defeat the monster, after which they learn it was attracted by the scent they had spread. Remembering that the town assembly is still in progress, they head back to <CLGR>Brunnen Manor<CLNR>. [memo]Return to Brunnen Manor on Treppe Hill.

After returning to the atelier, Ryza contemplates what she can do to become a more reliable alchemist. Empel tells her simply to just become what she wants to be. He gives her a new alchemy book and encourages her to make what she finds inside. [memo]Create one of the following items: Lightning Bell, Restoration Bottle, Energianica.

While Ryza is working on her synthesis, she receives word that Bos has disappeared from the village. They assume that if he left the island, he must have gone through the <CLGR>mainland port<CLNR>, and head off to search for him. [memo]Head to the mainland port.
At the port, Bos is still nowhere to be found--but what they *do* find is footsteps leading into the <CLGR>Sunken Mine<CLNR>. [memo]Head to the Sunken Mine.
While exploring the mine, they notice that the water has drained out, revealing a new path. The adventurers remain alert as they continue to <CLGR>search for Bos<CLNR>. [memo]Keep exploring the mine.
As the mine opens up, Ryza discovers a gate leading to the Underworld--which Bos may well have gone through himself. The adventurers steel their resolve and jump into the gate!

Before long, the group runs into Kilo--a member of the same race as Lila who has been continuing the fight against the Philuscha all on her own. As it turns out, she's also been looking after the injured Bos. She tells them how her world used to be beautiful, overflowing with pure sparkling water before an <CLGR>ancient artifact absorbed all the water<CLNR> and turned it into the desolate land they see before them. Bos reveals that he might know where that artifact is now--and in order to verify this, they all <CLGR>return to the island<CLNR>. [memo]Return to the Underworld gate.

Ryza promises Kilo that they'll do everything they can to help her world when they return home. With their original mission to rescue Bos complete, they head to <CLGR>Brunnen Manor<CLNR>. [memo]Return to Brunnen Manor on Treppe Hill.

Ryza makes her way to the annex as promised. Bos lets her in and reveals the ancient artifact to her. Bos wants to destroy it immediately, but Ryza stops him, saying that now isn't the time. She then decides to <CLGR>head back to the atelier<CLNR>.

Back at the atelier, Empel admits to being a little jealous of Ryza's growth, although at the same time he's overjoyed. It's clear that the other members have grown as well, and Ryza decides to <CLGR>take in the town<CLNR> one more time. [memo]Visit the Rasen district, the Boden district, and the Valentz residence, then return to the atelier.

At the atelier, Tao is intently reading through one of his books--it seems his ancestors were responsible for some kind of ceremony. Ryza continues to work on her alchemy with the ancient artifact at the front of her mind. [memo]Wait 2 days while doing synthesis or other activities.

Ryza successfully synthesizes Empel's prosthetic arm, allowing him to regain his old strength and officially join the party. They decide to wait for Bos to <CLGR>get in touch with them<CLNR>. [memo]Wait at the atelier for about 1 day.
The next day, Bos gets in touch and asks to meet with all of them, so they head off to see what he has to say. [memo]Head to Brunnen Manor on Treppe Hill.

Bos reveals a map that shows a tower far to the north of the island--it seems like this is where the ancient artifact was first discovered. The adventurers strike out for <CLGR>the tower<CLNR> in the hopes of uncovering the truth. [memo]Head to the tower to the northwest of the Traveler's Road.
At long last, the group arrives at the tower. They investigate the area in detail hoping to uncover the true nature of the tower. [memo]Reach the top floor of the tower.

On the top floor of the tower, Ryza discovers a mysterious key--as well as a letter that had been left behind detailing how Kurken Island was actually a manmade structure. As they <CLGR>leave the tower<CLNR>, Ryza and the others can't hide their surprise. [memo]Return to the atelier.

After failing to figure out anything meaningful, they decide to split up to search for places where the key might fit. [memo]Investigate different parts of Kurken Island, including: Secluded Farm, Old Town, Kurken Port, and Treppe Hill.

Among all the stone monuments scattered across Kurken Island, the adventurers felt like the one on Treppe Hill was the most suspicious. But despite Ryza's repeated efforts, she couldn't get the key to fit anywhere. She decides to <CLGR>return to the atelier<CLNR> and wait for the others for the time being.

Nobody's able to learn anything useful, and Ryza can't help but wonder if the key had lost whatever power it might have over the years. She decides to use alchemy to <CLGR>rebuild the key<CLNR> and boost its power. [memo]Use the Old Pynnor Key to create the Pynnor Key.

Ryza tries the key on the monument one more time, and this time it activates in full, opening a path into the depths of the manmade island. The adventurers are overjoyed, and they <CLGR>rush inside<CLNR> to see what awaits them. [memo]Head down into Kurken Island.

At last, Ryza arrives at what appears to be the very center of Kurken Island, where they discover that the island's power has been waning, causing the island to begin to drift and sink. They immediately realize the danger they're in, and quickly <CLGR>rush back to the atelier<CLNR> to summarize their findings.

Ryza returns to the bunker, where Tao reveals that there's a series of desalination devices which convert the lake's salt water into fresh drinking water. This system would provide a water source for the island without having to rely on the ancient artifact currently in the possession of Bos's family. Tao says that <CLGR>Bos<CLNR> is a part of this, and that he should know what's going on. [memo]Head to Brunnen Manor on Treppe Hill.

Lent sneaks away from the atelier, and Ryza decides to follow him. She watches as he meets up with Bos, where they proceed to train in secret--all awkwardness between them seems to have disappeared. Meanwhile, Ryza is still trying to fix the desalination devices, but she has to wait until Tao can finish his research. [memo]Focus on synthesizing and wait about 3 days.

After a few days, Tao finally finishes researching what they'll need to repair the desalination devices. But even with the power of alchemy on their side, he doesn't know what materials they'll need. So Ryza takes on the responsibility of gathering the materials herself. Tao asks her to meet him in the <CLGR>underground bunker<CLNR> again once it's all ready. [memo]Make 3 Super Steel Gears with a quality of at least 100 and bring them to Tao in the underground bunker.

Lent and Tao burst into the atelier, shouting about Philuscha appearing from a nearby gate. Knowing they can't afford to waste time panicking, they head for <CLGR>the gate<CLNR> straight away! [memo]Head to the Underworld gate in the hidden cove.

The Philuscha had been pouring out of the gate, but it seems that most of them have already retreated. But the adventurers know that they had to deal with the few that remained, so they gather up all their courage and attack!

After a fierce battle, they defeat the Philuscha. But the chances of a massive invasion are now higher than ever. They know they won't be able to stop it once it begins, and there isn't much time left now. So they <CLGR>return to the atelier<CLNR> in order to formulate a plan.

After visiting various townsfolk, Ryza returns to her atelier. Everyone says they're ready, so they head to <CLGR>the gate<CLNR> for one final showdown. [memo]Head to the Underworld gate in the hidden cove.
Ryza and the others stand before the gate--they steel their resolve and step into the Underworld. [memo]Head to the Underworld.
Having returned to the Underworld, they decide to once more <CLGR>meet up with Kilo<CLNR> to get her advice on how to defeat the Ravaging Queen. [memo]Find Kilo.

After walking for some time, the group reaches the deepest part of the Underworld, where they stand face-to-face with the Ravaging Queen. In order to save Kurken Island and their own personal world, the adventurers prepare for the final battle!

After a long and painful battle, the Ravaging Queen has fallen. Ryza returns to Kilo to give her the good news of their victory, and promise to return the water to the Underworld as soon as they return home. [memo]Return to the atelier.

Looking around the underground bunker, Ryza's struck with sudden inspiration for what she might need to fix everything, and comes up with the recipe on the spot. She quickly <CLGR>returns to the atelier<CLNR> to put her idea into action. [memo]Synthesize the Red Stone with a quality of at least 120.
Ryza successfully creates the Red Stone, then returns to the <CLGR>underground bunker<CLNR> to test it out.

Tao activates the Red Stone, but it turns out it's just not powerful enough. Ryza considers the problem again before coming up with a new recipe. Once again, she <CLGR>returns to the atelier<CLNR> to get to work. [memo]Synthesize the Crimson Stone.
With the Crimson Stone, she returns to the <CLGR>underground bunker<CLNR> one more time. All her hopes are riding on this...

The adventurers return to the Underworld one more time to meet up with Kilo. As they all look on, Bos destroys the ancient artifact--the root cause of all this strife. Almost instantly, the land is nearly overflowing with water--they kept their promise, and the Underworld will eventually return to its former glory. Satisfied, they prepare to <CLGR>leave the Underworld<CLNR> and seal the gate behind them. [memo]Return to the Underworld gate in the hidden cove.
The gate to the Underworld has been sealed--it's all over. Ryza and the others <CLGR>return to the atelier<CLNR>.

Klaudia tells everyone that she and her father will be leaving. The others also describe their plans to leave the island, and so Ryza decides to throw a going-away party. But first she wants to <CLGR>visit a number of places<CLNR> from her past. [memo]Head to the Rasen district, the Boden district, Kurken Port, Brunnen Manor, and the Valentz residence, then return to the atelier.

Empel has an idea he'd like to pursue, but he doesn't have enough evidence. Empel is unable to tell Tao how to proceed, so Tao decides to simply <CLGR>explore the island<CLNR> in search of potential clues. [memo]Head to the Secluded Farm, Secluded Goat Farm, and Tao's Home.

Despite their best efforts, their efforts bear no fruit. This leads to an argument, and Lent storms off, leaving Tao and Ryza on their own. They quickly come up with another plan, and decide to <CLGR>head to the area where they went fishing before<CLNR>.

After a long and arduous search, Tao and Ryza find the stone materials they were looking for. Ryza wishes to process the stone into something more useful, and the pair bring them to the <CLGR>attic at Ryza's house<CLNR>. [memo]Synthesize Stone Material.

They managed to synthesize some of the materials they need to cover the waterway, but they still need a lot more. They decide it's time to go into mass production. [memo]Bring 10 Stone Materials to Ryza, who's waiting at Treppe Hill.

Tao and Ryza have all the stone they need, but it's still not enough to completely stop the flow of water. Ryza comes up with a plan to fill in the gaps, and the two of them <CLGR>return to her attic<CLNR> to start synthesizing. [memo]Synthesize Liquid Gel.

On their way to Treppe Hill, they run into Lent. Tao and Lent make up, and Lent soon joins them to help finish damming up the waterway. With the water no longer flowing, the mystery lurking beneath it is uncovered. With their original goal in sight, they <CLGR>head to their former fishing spot<CLNR>.

They descend to the bottom of the waterway and discover a strange object. But it's covered in so much dirt and grime, they can't tell what it actually is. So they decide to <CLGR>return to Ryza's attic<CLNR> and give it a good scrubbing. [memo]Synthesize Cleansing Gel.

After taking a look at it, Empel declares the item to be a long-lost artifact remnant. He's not sure how it wound up here, but suggests that an alchemist may have brought it to the island long ago. This is exciting news, so everyone rushes off to the <CLGR>Boden District<CLNR> to look for more potential remnants.

Unfortunately, the group isn't unable to uncover any new information. Meanwhile, the entire village is up in arms about the sudden water stoppage. Agatha gives them a good scolding, and they quickly return everything back to the way it was.^00^00Gazing at the restored waterway, the trio can't help but wonder at what other mysteries are still hiding in the village, just waiting to be discovered. They promise to find something together again someday.
Lent and Tao head to the Traveler's Path in order to do a little hunting. [memo]Gather 3 pieces of Fresh Meat and take them to Ryza at the atelier.

Lent hands over the silver-tinted Unis that Ryza requested. Meanwhile, Klaudia fills them in about a rumor she's heard regarding a monster taking up residence at Meteor Castle, where they once did battle with a fearsome dragon. Lent decides to learn the truth for himself, and do a little personal training along the way; he <CLGR>sets out for Meteor Castle<CLNR>.

Upon reaching the castle, Lent is confronted by a monster he's never seen before. He has no idea how powerful it might be, and so aren't sure if he can beat it without Ryza's help. Regardless, he gathers up his courage and prepares to fight!
After a long, punishing battle, Lent stands victorious. He continues his exploration of the castle. [memo]Head to the top of Meteor Castle.

Lent has fought against countless monsters, and claimed victory every time. He's not sure why so many monsters have taken over the castle, but he decides to put an end to his adventure and <CLGR>return to the atelier<CLNR> before he's attacked again.

When Lent and Tao arrive at the atelier, they discover that Ryza has cooked them up something special. She suggests that they go and fight the monster living at Meteor Castle, but Lent and Tao laugh, explaining that they already did.^00^00Lent feels like he's grown stronger, but also realizes that he's never as strong as when he's fighting alongside his friends. This new insight makes him appreciate Ryza even more than he did before.

At Moritz's summer home, Ryza and her friends review their reason for coming to the island--they believe there's a monster wreaking havoc all around the lake. Ryza is excited to <CLGR>explore the island<CLNR> in search of the unknown beast. [memo]Search different areas around Moritz Island.

While exploring the island, they discover some kind of cave-like structure. Unfortunately, there's a huge boulder blocking the entrance. Luckily, Empel's able to teach Ryza how to make a Bomb powerful enough to destroy it, and Ryza <CLGR>returns to the Moritz summer home<CLNR>. [memo]Create a Demolition Bomb with at least 70 Quality, then return with it to the boulder.
Before long, the cave comes to a sudden dead end within the island. Here they encounter the monster they've been looking for, and they prepare for a fight!

After defeating the monster, the party decides to stay on the island a bit longer; after all, it's not every day they get to spend time in such a lovely location. They decide to <CLGR>further explore the island<CLNR>. [memo]Explore the nearby area.

During their exploration, the group discovers a Kurken Fruit many times larger than any they've ever seen on their home island. Lent suggests they play a game of Fruit Splitter, and asks Ryza to <CLGR>track down the best Kurken Fruit she can find<CLNR>. [memo]Gather a Giant Kurken Fruit and give it to Lent.

Empel and Lila discover ancient Klint Kingdom relics in an area that was apparently once used for alchemy research. They decide to set up base there and then <CLGR>head into the Underworld<CLNR> once again.
As the two progress, they stumble upon a group of Philuscha. Assuming they won't be able to sneak through undetected, the pair decide to launch a surprise attack!

Empel suddenly begins suffering from a severe headache and a number of other symptoms, which obviously worries Lila. Still, Empel resolves to endure it in order to <CLGR>continue their exploration<CLNR>.

The duo find the remains of a wall that dates back to the Klint Kingdom. Empel thinks the source of the "pressure" he's feeling is lurking behind the wall, and decides to create a Bomb to destroy it. For now, they <CLGR>return to their homebase<CLNR> at the forest entrance.

At their homebase, Empel comes up with a recipe for the explosive; they gather the necessary materials from the nearby area and then <CLGR>synthesize the Bomb<CLNR>. [memo]Synthesize a Scarlet Tera Bomb.
They return to the wall and use the Scarlet Tera Bomb, blowing it to pieces. Despite still suffering from his headache, Empel resolves to <CLGR>proceed further<CLNR>.
Empel and Lila reach the end of the path, only to discover a young Ravaging Queen. Realizing the danger of such a powerful foe, they enter into a decisive battle!
The pair manage to defeat the young Ravaging Queen. Seeing no further threats in the area, they seal off the gate and return to continue their search for more.

After Klaudia explains what she has in mind, Lila suggests making a donut, since Empel loves sweets more than anything. They decide to use the oven located behind the atelier. But first, Klaudia needs to <CLGR>make the base ingredients<CLNR>. [memo]Prepare the ingredients and make Sweet Dough.
Klaudia finishes the dough, but decides she wants to <CLGR>make a donut with a special twist<CLNR> by adding an extra ingredient--oil. [memo]Make a Plain Donut.
Klaudia succeeds in making the donut, but Lila suggests <CLGR>adding some whipped cream<CLNR>, so Klaudia prepares to add another extra touch. [memo]Make Whipped Cream.

Tao thinks he knows where Klaudia can find the berries she's looking for, so she decides to <CLGR>head to Pixie Forest to try and track them down<CLNR>. [memo]Head to the Forest Clearing in Pixie Forest and find the berries in question.
After finding the berries, Klaudia rushes back to get to work. [memo]Return to the atelier and use the berries to make Whipped Cream.
Klaudia manages to make her whipped cream. Now, with all the ingredients assembled, she prepares to <CLGR>tackle her final challenge--the ultimate donut<CLNR>.
Ryza tells everyone about what she saw. Setting out together, they reach the <CLGR>glowing doorway<CLNR>. [memo]Head to the Forest Clearing in Pixie Forest and reach the glowing door.

Stepping through the door, they find themselves not in the Underworld as they had expected, but a deserted island. They observe ruins from the Klint Kingdom, as well as traces of alchemy here and there. They decide to further explore the island.

As they walk across the island, the group hears an echoing voice above them. A Great Elemental has appeared! It warns them that if they wish to continue on, they'll have to defeat all of the Great Elementals. Which means five brutal fights in a row!
They reach the thing known as the Calamity, and prepare to confront it.
However, as they approach, another Great Elemental appears and challenges them to battle! It's not over yet!
The party is victorious once again, and once again the Great Elemental implores them to defeat the Calamity. Naturally Ryza and the others agree, and steel themselves for one final battle.

After their toughest battle yet, the group manages to defeat the Calamity. Another shining door appears; they all rush through, and suddenly find themselves back in Pixie Forest.^00^00They come to the conclusion that the mysterious island existed solely to quarantine the Calamity, and Ryza wonders what other undiscovered mysteries the world might hold...

Ryza was living her ordinary life on Kurken Island, day after day. Until the day that she finally decided to go ahead with her plans for an adventure along with her childhood friends, Lent and Tao. That was the same day she heard the news that an important merchant would be arriving from the mainland.
After winning their very first battle with a monster, the three adventurers head <CLGR>deeper into the forest<CLNR>.

Ryza and Klaudia, the daughter of the newly arrived merchant, become fast friends. But when Agatha finds out Ryza left the island, she gives her a very large piece of her mind. While all the adults head to Brunnen Manor for a welcome banquet, Ryza and her friends <CLGR>leave the village once again<CLNR>.

Empel, a traveling alchemist, uncovers Ryza's hidden talent for alchemy. He tasks her with gathering <CLGR>Nameless Grass<CLNR> to use in a synthesis. She learns that this can be gathered in Fairystone Forest, to the west of Kurken Port. Excited, the adventurers <CLGR>head to the forest<CLNR>. [memo]Leave Empel's residence.

As Ryza works on her synthesis, Lent and Tao show up to encourage her to travel to the mainland once again. But this time they've got tools made using alchemy, and the goal of gathering more alchemy materials. With that in mind, they head off for <CLGR>the mainland<CLNR>.

As she arrives home, Ryza tries to sneak in unnoticed--but her mother catches her right away. Mio forces Ryza to help with the harvest of their crop of Kurken Fruit. Her top priority now is to use alchemy to create a scythe, so she <CLGR>seeks out Empel<CLNR> to get his advice.

When Ryza returns home, she discovers that Lent and Tao have learned where Klaudia is staying, and they suggest that the three of them go pay her a visit. For her part, Ryza's curious to find out what happened to her after they saved her from the monster. So they head off to <CLGR>Old Town<CLNR>, where Klaudia is said to be staying.

Deep within Pixie Forest, they discover a clearing that piques Ryza's interest. Unsure what to do about it, however, she decides to head home and hole herself up <CLGR>in her room<CLNR> to organize her thoughts.

The adventurers report back to Lila, where they discover their task was actually a test to see how much they had grown. They receive a passing grade, and swear to each other to keep on adventuring and bettering themselves. [memo]Wait 1 day, and then return to Empel and Lila's residence.

Ryza gets another earful from her mother, and now with Klaudia spending more time at her house, Ryza decides they need a base for their adventures away from their parents' prying eyes. So she decides to build her very own secret hideout in the <CLGR>Pixie Forest clearing<CLNR>. Unsure how to begin this task, she decides to <CLGR>get Empel's input<CLNR> once again.

As they look around Ryza's new atelier, the adventurers sense the presence of something deeper within the forest. With a mix of curiosity and apprehension, they <CLGR>decide to investigate<CLNR>. [memo]Head deeper into the forest.

After hearing what Ryza has planned, Klaudia decides she wants to join them. She asks Ryza to <CLGR>wait one more day<CLNR> so she can convince her father, Lubart, to let her take part. [memo]Wait 1 day, and then visit Klaudia at her home.

After successfully fixing the leak in Klaudia's basement, Ryza prepares to receive her next task. She decides to focus on her alchemy while she waits for further instructions. [memo]Wait 2 days, then head to the Boden district.

Ryza learns that the local fisherman haven't been catching any fish lately. She assures them that she can use her alchemy to create a new kind of fish bait, then returns to her atelier to work on the recipe. She has a feeling that <CLGR>flour<CLNR> will be a core component of the synthesis. [memo]Use "Envision Recipe" on Flour to synthesize at least 5 Delicious Baits and bring them to the fishermen at the port.

Bos is waiting for the adventurers on the mainland, where they find out that they'll be competing with him to reach a hut far to the north on the Traveler's Road and copy down what they find written there. The task seems simple enough, but there are sure to be powerful monsters lurking along the way. Ryza and her friends <CLGR>race off to the north<CLNR>.
Klaudia finally gets permission to join Ryza on her adventures. Feeling even closer than ever, Ryza decides to <CLGR>visit Klaudia<CLNR> once again.

After returning to the secret hideout, the adventurers discuss the party that Moritz is putting together to hunt down the dragon believed to haunt <CLGR>Meteor Castle<CLNR>, famous from countless nursery rhymes. The hunting party is likely already on the mainland and may stumble upon the atelier, so Ryza and the others head to the port to see what's going on. [memo]Head to the mainland port.

The adventurers defeat the dragon living in the old castle. Fortunately, neither Bos nor anyone else are seriously injured, but they decide to return to the island for the time being. Guessing that Moritz is probably worried sick about Bos, Ryza decides to pay a visit to Brunnen Manor on <CLGR>Treppe Hill<CLNR>.

Ryza creates an item that will help them fight the Philuscha. She starts wondering how everyone is doing after the ordeal with the dragon, so she heads to <CLGR>the center of town<CLNR>. [memo]Head to the Boden district.

Ryza creates an even more powerful fish bait, and heads to <CLGR>Kurken Port<CLNR> to have the fishermen test it out. [memo]Deliver the Powerful Fish Bait with a quality of at least 70 to the fishermen at Kurken Port.

Ryza heads to Brunnen Manor. Moritz is calm initially, but becomes suddenly enraged at Empel's request to investigate Treppe Hill. Unsure what caused the unexpected outburst, Ryza and Empel head to <CLGR>Kurken Port<CLNR> and meet up with Lila.

Ryza runs into Agatha on the way back to the village and learns about all the nasty rumors about Empel that have been spreading around town. Angry at this news, Ryza decides to <CLGR>investigate further<CLNR>. [memo]Head to the nearby Rasen district.

After returning to her atelier, Ryza passes on Empel's summons to him. For his part, Empel fearlessly heads for the town assembly. Understandably worried, Ryza and the others head for <CLGR>Brunnen Manor<CLNR> as well. [memo]Head to Brunnen Manor on Treppe Hill.

After the adventurers dispatch the deadly monster, the town assembly disbands seemingly spontaneously. It's revealed that Bos himself was responsible for the meeting, creating even more tension between him and Ryza. They decide to <CLGR>return to the atelier<CLNR> for the moment.

The adventurers enter the Submerged Mine and discover Lumbar, who was supposed to be with Bos. They learn that Bos was chased off by monsters, so they <CLGR>head further in<CLNR>. They're surprised to discover the ruins awaiting them, but push forward undeterred.
While searching for Bos, the adventurers find themselves transported to the Underworld--Lila's homeland. They wander <CLGR>deep into the forest<CLNR> in search of Bos.

Moritz profusely thanks Ryza and the others. Meanwhile, Bos asks for a few days to find the key to the secret area in his house and expose his family's darkest secret. Ryza promises to sneak out and meet him when the time is right. [memo]Wait at least 3 days, then head to the back of Brunnen Manor.

Lila finds Ryza and asks her to create a prosthetic to help with Empel's injured arm. Lila has the recipe, but not the necessary materials. She thinks the <CLGR>Gathering Synthesizer<CLNR> is the key to getting what she needs, and Ryza decides to give it a try. [memo]Use the Gathering Synthesizer to find the materials needed to make the prosthetic with a quality of at least 80, then deliver it to Lila.

The adventurers arrive at the ruins built into the very walls of the valley--with the tower waiting further beyond. They come across what appears to be an ancient battlefield, but they have no choice but to <CLGR>hurry on ahead<CLNR>. [memo]Head further into the valley.

Ryza and the others return home from Pynnor Tower. While there, they discovered what appears to be some kind of key, and they theorize that it must have something to do with the island itself. Thinking <CLGR>Treppe Hill<CLNR> might have something to do with it, they head that way.
Having created the new Pynnor Tower key, they return to the <CLGR>Treppe Hill<CLNR> monument--the spot they consider the most suspicious. [memo]Head to the stone monument on Treppe Hill.

The adventurers return to the atelier in order to sort out everything they've learned. The device keeping the island afloat is running out of power, so Ryza believes that the only way to avoid impending doom is to recharge the device. Later, Tao asks Ryza to meet him in the <CLGR>underground bunker<CLNR> one more time.

Ryza tells Bos everything they've learned, and Bos is impatient to do something about it. Ryza agrees that they have to act, but she's not sure what they should actually do. They <CLGR>head back to the atelier<CLNR> to try and come up with a plan.

Ryza synthesizes the Super Steel Gears, which Tao is able to attach to the desalination devices. With those fixed, Tao feels certain that all they need to do now is create a new power reactor and everything will return to normal. With one major problem solved, they <CLGR>head back to the atelier<CLNR> to figure out their next step. [memo]Wait at the atelier for around 3 days.

Ryza considers a number of options, but the most surefire solution seems to be defeating the Ravaging Queen outright. Everyone prepares for the journey, and knowing how dangerous it will be, Ryza goes around visiting with everyone in town. [memo]Visit your home, the Rasen district, the Boden district, the Valentz residence, and Treppe Hill, then return to your atelier.
Kilo explains where to find the Ravaging Queen, and the group heads there right away. [memo]Head deeper into the Underworld.
The adventurers return to the atelier and discuss how to deal with the remaining problems. Ryza decides they should investigate the <CLGR>underground bunker<CLNR> one more time.

Ryza creates the Crimson Stone, which fully restores power to the desalination devices--her synthesis was a complete success. As Ryza sees the fresh water flowing from the fountain, she thinks about how they have to head back to the <CLGR>Underworld<CLNR> and return the water to the Oren people. [memo]Head to the Underworld.

Ryza throws a going-away party for everyone--even Bos. They all discuss their future plans, and although they're all going their separate ways, they promise to meet up again in the future. Ryza swears to continue working hard as an alchemist, there at Atelier Ryza.

Ryza, Lent, and Tao had caused a fair amount of havoc on the peaceful Kurken Island, but their ordinary lives never seemed to change. Until the day that Empel and Lila arrived from the outside world, giving them a new perspective on life.^00^00One day, they haul up a piece of metal from the water while out fishing. Tao thinks it might come from a time long since passed, so they decide to <CLGR>speak with Empel about it<CLNR>. [memo]Find Empel in the east end of Old Town.

Realizing it would be too difficult to keep hauling things up from the water with a fishing pole, they decide to block the waterway, drain the water, and open up a path to explore. They prepare to head to <CLGR>Pixie Forest<CLNR> to gather up rocks and other materials to build a dam. [memo]Go to Arbor Ruins and Forest Clearing at Pixie Forest and gather 5 or more Eroded Stones.
Tao and Ryza create the necessary materials to fill in the gaps in the stones. They <CLGR>head to Treppe Hill to test it out<CLNR>.

Ryza polishes the mysterious item with the substance she created, but they still have no idea what it actually is. Tao and Ryza decide to go ask Empel about it one more time. [memo]Find Empel in the east end of Old Town.

Ryza, Tao, and Lent had always lived uneventful lives on Kurken Island. Until the day that Empel, a self-proclaimed alchemist, and his companion Lila arrived and changed their lives forever.^00^00Eventually, they faced off against a dragon sung about in folk tales and defeated it; Lent could officially call himself a dragon slayer. But he's never been fully certain he could take credit for what happened.^00^00One day, Ryza asks Lent to bring her some Fresh Meat, and he sets out to hunt down some wildlife, with Tao at his side. [memo]Leave the atelier and head west on the Traveler's Path.

After receiving her Fresh Meat, Ryza next says that she needs 6 Silver Unis. None of them are exactly sure where to find them, so they decide to just check every Uni tree they can find <CLGR>along the road<CLNR>. [memo]Gather 6 Silver Unis and bring them to Ryza at the atelier.
At the top of Meteor Castle, Lent comes face to face with the rumored monster. He stands there, unsure if he really stands a chance, when suddenly the beast attacks!
One day Ryza arrived on an island that nobody knew about. The island is owned by Moritz, a person of authority at Kurken Island. Upon arrival Ryza decided to visit Moritz Summer Home.
Empel was able to destroy the giant boulder by using the Demolition Bomb that Ryza gave him.^00Ryza decided to <CLGR>enter the cave<CLNR>.

Everyone enjoyed the beach by playing Kurken Fruit splitting and other beach activities.^00Ryza used to think there was nothing interesting here, but now she thinks spending a peaceful time isn't all that bad. Looking out at the sunset, she promised herself to come back here again with everyone.

Parting with Ryza, both Empel and Lila are once again on a journey to close the gate to the Underworld. The two discovered a new gate near Kurken Island and decided to enter it. They are now traveling deeper into the Underworld.
After defeating Philuscha they felt it was stronger than usual, but <CLGR>continued to travel deeper into<CLNR> the Underworld.
Empel created the "Scarlet Tera Bomb." The two took this powerful bomb with them to destroy the wall that is located at the <CLGR>ruins deep inside<CLNR> the Underworld.

After seeing what Ryza can do with alchemy, Klaudia is motivated to create something for herself. After thinking long and hard, she decides to try her hand at cooking. Her goal is to make a gift for Empel, to thank him for everything he's done for everyone, and <CLGR>meets with Lila<CLNR> to get her advice.

Klaudia whips up some whipped cream, but Lila notices that it isn't quite the right color. She says that Empel mentioned it needs some kind of berry. Klaudia thinks Tao might be able to help, so she <CLGR>heads off to talk with him about it<CLNR>.

While in her atelier, Ryza hears a visitor arrive. She goes to greet them, only to discover it's that mischievous goat! It urges her to follow it, and before long they arrive at a mysterious glowing door. Ryza feels certain this has something to do with the Underworld, so she <CLGR>heads back to the atelier<CLNR> to tell the others. [memo]Return to the atelier.

Ryza and the others manage to defeat all of the Great Elementals, who implore her to defeat the "Calamity" that they had sealed away on the secret island. So our heroes <CLGR>push ahead<CLNR> to confront this new challenge.

The group stands before the Calamity that had been sealed away. But much time has passed, and the seal is about to fail. Ryza is resolved to prevent whatever awaits them before it can wreak havoc on the world. They undo the seal, and a terrible beast suddenly appears! With the hopes of the Great Elementals resting on their shoulders, they rush into battle...
Fressher's store & Kurken Port market have new items!

The End of an Adventure and Beyond
Ever Summer Queen & the Secret Island

After seeing what Ryza can do with alchemy, Klaudia is motivated to create something for herself. After thinking long and hard, she decides to try her hand at cooking. (You'll control Klaudia throughout this event.)
Lent has been training daily, and even managed to slay a dragon! But one thought keeps running through his head... (You'll control Lent throughout this event.)
Ryza uncovers a mysterious chunk of metal, and the three longtime friends decide to scour the island for clues about its true nature. (You'll control Tao throughout this event.)
After parting ways with Ryza, Lila and Empel continue their journey. They discover a new gate, and step foot into the Underworld once more. (You'll control Lila throughout this event.)
One day, Ryza receives a request from Mr. Moritz and subsequently finds herself on an unfamiliar island. She and her friends discuss the best way to enjoy their impromptu tropical vacation.
